bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Directives for digitizing and archiving government information

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The chief records officer may issue directives to a government body in relation to the digitizing and archiving of government information.
The minister may designate a person appointed under the Public Service Act as a person who must approve a directive or class of directives issued under this section.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Chief records officer may request information from head of government body
bcl:section.bcl:text: The chief records officer may request information from a head of a government body in relation to the government body's management of government information.

change.changenote: Section 8 BEFORE re-enacted by 2017-7-3, effective March 31, 2019 (BC Reg 65/2019).

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Chief records officer may access information
bcl:section.bcl:text: If requested by a government body for the purpose of this Act, the chief records officer may access information, including personal information, held by the government body.
